titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the School of Architecture, Yale University, Records of the Dean
School of Architecture, Yale University, Records of the Dean
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:24

did.unittitle: School of Architecture, Yale University, records of the dean

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of printed material, reports, subject and committee files, correspondence, newspaper clippings, student publication, two DVDs "Student Resumes and Work Samples", one DVD "Kent and Nona Bloomer In-Coming Student Picnic", and course evaluations of the dean of the Yale School of Architecture. Topics include the renovation of the Art and Architecture building, re-accreditation of the school, and visiting critics.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 19-A (YRG 19-A), Central records and records of the dean of the School of Architecture.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

Original born digital files, as well as preservation masters, may not be accessed due to their fragility. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist request that they be made. Born digital files cannot be accessed remotely. System requirements include a Manuscripts and Archives computer and file viewing software.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: School of Architecture, Yale University, Records of the Dean (RU 843). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of printed material, reports, subject and committee files, correspondence, newspaper clippings, student publication, two DVDs "Student Resumes and Work Samples", one DVD "Kent and Nona Bloomer In-Coming Student Picnic", and course evaluations of the dean of the Yale School of Architecture. Topics include the renovation of the Art and Architecture building, re-accreditation of the school, and visiting critics.

did.unittitle: Program for the symposium titled "People of Color in Architecture"

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

did.unittitle: Program for the symposium titled "People of Color in Architecture"

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
